tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geospatial_renewable_energy_sites (
    site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name VARCHAR(50),
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8),
    solar_potential VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_sources (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    site_name STRING,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    energy_type STRING
);

CREATE TABLE solar_farms (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name STRING,
    location STRING,
    capacity INT,
    status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE solar_farms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    size FLOAT,
    capacity FLOAT,
    location GEOMETRY,
    PRIMARY KEY (id, site_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES sites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    wind_speed FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id, site_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES sites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_production (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    production FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id, site_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES sites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE power_consumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    site_id INT,
    consumption FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    PRIMARY KEY (id, site_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (site_id) REFERENCES sites(id)
);
